entry.title: EGGPLANT Kitchen Towel
entry.summary:
Vendor: Physically Disabled Weavers’ Initiative
Type: Cotton - Handwoven
Price: 6.75

Size 27"x19"
100% cotton
Handwoven on manual looms
Features a loop for hanging
Strong, durable construction
Low-impact dyes
Machine wash cold. Tumble dry low
Crafted by physically challenged artisans from Northern India

Description

Add a handmade touch to your kitchen with a handloom-woven kitchen towel. Highly absorbent and washable, Sustainable Threads' kitchen towel is sturdy, durable and a practical way to reduce use of disposable paper towels. Packaged with a belly band and a hanger, it makes an excellent host or hostess gift.

A Fair Trade product. Handmade by artisans in India.

How It’s Made

This textile is produced on hand-operated looms, one of the oldest methods of textile production. The weaving involves interlinking a set of vertical threads (warp) with a set of horizontal threads (weft.) meticulous planning and a complex estimation, depending on the design. 

Handwoven at a small weaving unit in Northern India by adult members of a community of physically challenged artisans, and their families. The work offers them employment, life skills training and an avenue for social acceptance.

How It’s Made

Handwoven at a small weaving unit in Northern India by adult members of a community of physically challenged artisans, and their families. The work offers them employment, life skills training and an avenue for social acceptance.

entry.title: MAYA Kitchen Towel
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tribal Spinner's Initiative (Cotton)
Type: Cotton - Handwoven
Price: 7.00

Size 27"x19"
100% cotton
Handspun
Handwoven on manual looms
Features a loop for hanging
Strong, durable construction
Low-impact dyes
Machine wash cold. Tumble dry low 
Crafted by rural and tribal artisans from Northern India

Description 

Remarkably soft, this attractive kitchen towel offers a distinct texture obtained from handspun yarn and showcases the splendor of hand-done weaves. Add a handmade touch to your kitchen with a handloom-woven kitchen towel. Highly absorbent and washable, Sustainable Threads' kitchen towel is sturdy, durable and a practical way to reduce use of disposable paper towels. Packaged with a belly band and a hanger, it makes an excellent host or hostess gift.

A Fair Trade product. Handmade by artisans in India. 

How It's Made 

First, the yarn is handspun. A blend of handspun and conventional yarn is used. This textile is produced on hand-operated looms, one of the oldest methods of textile production. The weaving involves interlinking a set of vertical threads (warp) with a set of horizontal threads (weft,) meticulous planning and a complex estimation, depending on the design.  

Each of the steps - spinning of the yarn, dyeing with low impact Azo-free dyes and weaving the products on wooden pit looms - support local artisan livelihood.
